sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import './account.css'; const CustomFormText = (props) => {props.children || (props.default || '\u00A0')} ; const AccountSignUp = () => { let navigate = useNavigate(); const [signUpFormData, setSignUpFormData] = useState({ idNotUsableReason: null, nickNotUsableReason: '', emailNotUsableReason: '', passwordNotUsableReason: '', passwordReTypeNotUsableReason: 'qwe', signUpFailedReason: '', }); return

계정 만들기

아이디 {signUpFormData.idNotUsableReason} 별칭 {signUpFormData.nickNotUsableReason} 이메일 {signUpFormData.emailNotUsableReason} 비밀번호 {signUpFormData.emailNotUsableReason ? '비밀번호는 8자 이상, 대소문자/숫자/특수문자 중 2가지 이상의 조합으로 사용해주세요.' : ''} 비밀번호 확인 {signUpFormData.passwordReTypeNotUsableReason || '\u00A0'} {signUpFormData.signUpFailedReason}
; } export { AccountSignUp };
